item.title: Multilinear Interpolation in tensorflow
item.description: Extension of the tf.image.resize_bilinear to the N dimensional case Visit the github repository for the full code. GitHub The function extends the functionality of tf.image.resize_bilinear for N dimensional Tensors. Strategy The strategy is fairly simple, tensors are interpolated two dimensions at a time using the already existant tf.image.resize_bilinear function. Test Building a 3D volume using a black image, an android image and a white image. [1, 245, 206, 3, 4] [1 batch, height, width, depth, 4 channels]
